answers.answer: Medical assistance for refugees from Ukraine includes the right to receive medical care, along with information about health, vaccination, and assistance for HIV-infected individuals.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical assistance for refugees from Ukraine Eligibility for health care and other useful information'.

answers.answer: Information on how to use the services of a family doctor is provided, including details for patients with chronic diseases, preventive services, and home consultations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Family doctor and a basic package of services'.

answers.answer: The basic package of services from a family doctor includes information for patients with chronic diseases, preventive services, and home consultations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Family doctor and a basic package of services'.

answers.answer: A list of free laboratories for refugees is available under the section detailing laboratory analyses and imaging investigations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Laboratory analyzes and imaging investigations'.

answers.answer: A narrow specialist provides services that are part of their basic package.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: Information on where and how to obtain medical advice from a specialist is provided.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: Information regarding who pays for hospitalization treatment is available under the section on hospitalization services in public and private institutions.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Hospitalization services in public and private institutions'.

answers.answer: The basic dental medicine package includes dentist consultation and treatment, with a complete list of dental services available.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Dentistry in Romania: basic dental medicine package'.

answers.answer: Outpatient physical medicine and rehabilitation services are provided in health resorts, including a list of procedures and their duration.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical recovery, physical medicine and rehabilitation services'.

answers.answer: Medical recovery in hospitals and sanatoriums occurs through treatment, encompassing medical services in physical medicine and rehabilitation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical recovery in hospitals, sanatoriums'.

answers.answer: Medical consultations at home are available, in addition to the services provided in the minimum package.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical consultations at home and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: Medicines covered by the Health Fund are those listed on the compensation lists.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medicines reimbursed by the Health Fund'.

answers.answer: The procedure for obtaining medical devices is detailed, along with a list of products included in the basic package of medical products.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: Medical services are provided for Covid-19 patients, including free treatment for insured, uninsured, and other individuals in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Information for patients with Covid-19'.

answers.answer: Medical services for pregnant women include primary care, observation of normal pregnancies, and supervision of high-risk pregnancies.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical services for pregnant women'.

answers.answer: Information on how to obtain treatment and a list of programs are available under the National Health Program package.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'National curative health programs'.

answers.answer: A Women's center offers assistance with reproductive health services like contraception, breastfeeding, STD prevention, pregnancy monitoring, and abortions, as well as services for victims of domestic violence.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Get help at a Women's center'.
